ResourceHeader.AlternateName: The ICESTAR Data Repository hosted by the Institute for Physical Science and Technology, University of Maryland.
ResourceHeader.Description: The ICESTAR Data Repository hosted by the Institute for Physical Science and Technology, University of Maryland.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: The ICESTAR data are provided with the permission of the principal investigators, Theodore J. Rosenberg and Allan T. Weatherwax, who operate instruments at Antarctic and Arctic laboratories for the purpose of fostering cooperative studies of scientific interest.  Before disseminating or publishing these data, it would be courteous to contact the principal investigator.  We gratefully acknowledge support by the National Science Foundation.
